TopicTitle: Flag for my upcoming KSP/RO/RSS resies agency KASA

Articles.Content:
flag for kerb trek, my upcoming RO series. it is inspired by a lot of different things like the esa logo with the flags, the nasa worm logo, the lego space logo, and the normal KSP logo. the backstory of the series is that all country's work together so that is why all the flags (mostly from the country's that are most active in spacetravel right now) there also are a lot of references/easter eggs. try to find them all

 

Edited April 27, 2021 by minerbat
